title: Icon

properties.name: description
properties.value: Icons are symbols on a player's map (minimap or world map) representing certain buildings and locations.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Icon

Icons are symbols on a player's map (minimap or world map) representing certain buildings and locations.

Contents

  • 1 World map icon key
    • 1.1 Game features
    • 1.2 Tutors
    • 1.3 Training
    • 1.4 Shopping
    • 1.5 Other

World map icon key[edit | edit source]

The world map key is on the lower left side and when clicked, and displays a list of icons. In this list is an icon for specific locations in the game. Clicking on any of the entries in the key list and yellow circles will flash in the world map indicating where that building or location can be found. The list has four main categories as listed below:

Game features[edit | edit source]

Icon Key Location and notes
Agility shortcut Many places
Altar Many places, fairly evenly placed inside and outside towns. Only three on islands - one on Entrana, one on Tutorial Island, and another on Ape Atoll. None in Morytania.
Bank Most large towns, and some mini games. None in the Wilderness, except in the Mage Arena.
Clan Hub South-east corner of the Grand Exchange.
Combat Achievements By the entrance of the Warriors' Guild.
Death's Office Entrances to Death's Office.
Dungeon Many places, extremely dense in Gu'Tanoth. This icon is used for when dungeon map links are not available.
Hairdresser Falador
Holiday event Only appears during holiday events.
House portal Rimmington, Taverley, Pollnivneach, Hosidius, Rellekka, Brimhaven, Yanille and Prifddinas
Kourend task Favour-gaining activities in Great Kourend.
Makeover mage South-west of Falador
Map link Dungeon exits (exclusive to world map)
Minigame Many places
Poll booth Mostly located near banks
Quest start Various places centred in towns and cities.
Raids Lobby Chambers of Xeric on the summit of Mount Quidamortem and the Theatre of Blood in Ver Sinhaza
Task Master Karamja, Ardougne, Falador, Rellekka, Camelot, Shantay Pass, Lumbridge, Canifis, Varrock, Edgeville, and Tree Gnome Stronghold
Transportation All over Gielinor

Tutors[edit | edit source]

Icon Key Location and notes
Bank tutor Located in Lumbridge Castle (2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] bank).
Bond tutor South of the Grand Exchange.
Combat tutor Three trainers found south-east of Lumbridge General Store specialising in melee, ranged, and magic respectively.
Arthur the Clue Hunter Inside The Sheared Ram.
Cooking tutor Southern area of Lumbridge.
Crafting tutor Located on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Lumbridge Castle.
Danger tutor Centre of Lumbridge by the River Lum.
Deadman tutor Lumbridge's graveyard directly south of the church.
Fishing tutor South of Lumbridge by the fishing spots.
Hunting tutor Feldip Hunter area and Rellekka Hunter area
Ironman tutor Ironman Mode tutor Adam, located by the entrance to Lumbridge Castle.
Leagues tutor Kourend Castle, near the statue of King Rada I.
Lumbridge Guide Centre of Lumbridge by the River Lum.
Mining tutor South of Lumbridge by the East Lumbridge Swamp mine
Prayer tutor Lumbridge church.
Security tutor Lumbridge's graveyard directly south of the church.
Smithing tutor Building south of Varrock West Bank. A smelting tutor can be found in Lumbridge by the furnace.
Woodcutting tutor South of the furnace in Lumbridge.

Training[edit | edit source]

Icon Key Location and notes
Agility training See: Agility
Anvil Various places, generally in towns and cities. Two in the Wilderness.
Bird house trapping sites Fossil Island
Brewery Port Phasmatys, Keldagrim
Combat training Burthorpe, Varrock, Prifddinas
Cooking range Many places
Dairy churn Most farming-related places
Dairy cow Various locations, mainly Lumbridge.
Farming patch See: Farming
Fishing spot Many places which border water. Often placed in clusters, such as in Catherby and in the Fishing Guild in Hemenster.
Furnace site Various towns and cities.
Hunter training See: Hunter
Loom South of Falador, Fossil island camp, Prifddinas and in Tirannwn
Mining site Various places, mostly outside of towns and cities.
Potters wheel Rellekka, Barbarian Village, Crafting Guild, Ardougne
Rare trees Many places, few in towns or cities.
Sand pit Entrana, Yanille, Rellekka, Prifddinas and Zanaris
Singing bowl Prifddinas and Brimstail's cave
Slayer Master See: Slayer master
Spinning wheel Lumbridge, Falador, Seers' Village, Sophanem, Neitiznot, Prifddinas
Stagnant water source Braindeath Island Volcano
Water source Many places, mostly inside of towns and cities.
Windmill East of Draynor, west of Varrock, and north of Ardougne, Zanaris, Harmony Island
Woodcutting stump Neitiznot

Shopping[edit | edit source]

Icon Key Location and notes
Amulet shop Brimhaven
Apothecary Varrock, Warriors' Guild
Archery shop Rimmington, Keldagrim, Catherby, Lletya, the Dwarven Mines, beneath White Wolf Mountain, Void Knights' Outpost
Axe shop Warriors' Guild, Port Sarim, Lumbridge, Woodcutting Guild
Bounty Hunter Shop Edgeville
Candle shop Catherby and Lumbridge Swamp entrance
Chainmail shop Falador
Clothes shop Several places. Mostly minor towns such as Canifis. The only three in large cities are in Keldagrim and Varrock.
Crafting shop Keldagrim, Rimmington, Al Kharid, Ape Atoll, Prifddinas
Dye trader Aggie, Pollnivneach,Lletya, Prifddinas
Estate Agent Varrock, Seers' Village, Prifddinas, Falador, Ardougne and Hosidius
Farming shop Catherby, Farming guild, west of Port Phasmatys, south of Falador, north of East Ardougne, Hosidius, Prifddinas
Fishing shop Port Sarim, Catherby, Rellekka, Miscellania and Etceteria, Witchaven, and the Fishing Guild
Food shop Canifis, Keldagrim, Sophanem, Ardougne Cooks' Guild, Port Sarim, Miscellania Dungeon (after Royal Trouble)
Fur trader Varrock, Rellekka, East Ardougne
Garden supplier Falador Park and Farming guild
Gem shop Keldagrim, Falador, Ardougne, Prifddinas, Al Kharid
General store Most towns
Grand Exchange Varrock
Helmet shop Barbarian Village and Rellekka
Herbalist Taverley, Entrana, Nardah, Miscellania, Gu'Tanoth, Prifddinas
Holiday item trader Diango in Draynor Village
Hunter shop Nardah, Yanille
Jewellery Port Sarim
Junk checker Wise Old Man in Draynor Village
Mace shop Falador, Prifddinas
Magic shop Nine shops, some located in Varrock, Port Sarim, the Void Knights' Outpost, and the Mage Arena.
Mining shop Dwarven Mines, Keldagrim, Prifddinas
Newspaper trader Varrock Square
Pet insurance shop East Ardougne
Platebody shop Varrock, Ardougne, Prifddinas
Platelegs shop Al Kharid
Plateskirt shop Al-Kharid
Pricing expert Grand Exchange
Pub/bar Many places, mostly in towns and cities. Also mostly in continental Gielinor, with only a few on islands - three in Karamja and one in Mos Le'Harmless
Rope trader Ned in Draynor Village
Sawmill Lumber Yard, Prifddinas and the Woodcutting Guild
Scimitar shop Al Kharid, Ape Atoll
Shield shop Falador, Keldagrim
Silk trader Ardougne, Al Kharid, Prifddinas, Keldagrim
Silver shop Keldagrim, East Ardougne, Prifddinas, Kourend Castle
Spice shop Ardougne, Prifddinas
Staff shop Varrock, Prifddinas
Stonemason Keldagrim
Sword shop Varrock, Keldagrim, The Grand Tree, Taverley, Burthorpe, Prifddinas
Tannery Al Kharid, Crafting Guild, Ranging Guild, Neitiznot, Canifis
Taxidermist Canifis
Tea trader Varrock
Wine trader Fortunato in Draynor Village

Other[edit | edit source]

The following, while are not listed in the world map legend, are present on the map.

Icon Key Location and notes
Altar Found only in Zalcano's prison beneath Prifddinas.
Cookery shop Found in Yanille and the Cooks' Guild. It is labelled as a "Food shop".
Dungeon with map link Many places, used in place of the regular dungeon icon when a map link is present.
Kebab seller Found in Al-Kharid, Pollnivneach and Keldagrim. It is labelled as a "Food shop".
Pricing expert A variant found in the Grand Exchange
Pricing expert A variant found in the Grand Exchange
Pricing expert A variant found in the Grand Exchange
Pricing expert A variant found in the Grand Exchange
Vegetable store Two in shops found in Miscellania
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Icons''' are symbols on a player's map ([[minimap]] or [[world map]]) representing certain buildings and [[locations]].

==World map icon key==
The [[world map]] key is on the lower left side and when clicked, and displays a list of icons. In this list is an icon for specific locations in the game. Clicking on any of the entries in the key list and yellow circles will flash in the world map indicating where that building or location can be found. The list has four main categories as listed below:

|-

|[[Bank]]
|Most large towns, and some mini games. None in the [[Wilderness]], except in the [[Mage Arena]].
|-
|[[File:Clan Hub icon.png]]
|[[Clan Hub]]
|South-east corner of the [[Grand Exchange]].
|-
|[[File:Combat Achievements icon.png]]
|[[Combat Achievements]]
|By the entrance of the [[Warriors' Guild]].
|-
|[[File:Death's Office icon.png]]
|[[Death's Office]]

|-

|[[File:Hairdresser icon.png]]

|-

|Only appears during holiday events.
|-
|[[File:House portal icon.png]]
|[[Portal (Player-owned house)|House portal]]
|[[Rimmington]], [[Taverley]], [[Pollnivneach]], [[Hosidius]], [[Rellekka]], [[Brimhaven]], [[Yanille]] and [[Prifddinas]] 
|-
|[[File:Kourend task icon.png]]
|Kourend task

|}
